verbs.description: He [V: can] never pass up a chance to make an ass of himself : Senator Ted Cruz ( R - Tx . ) went on a lengthy , midnight tweetstorm last night , attempting to defend his silence over President Donald Trump‘s claim that he could pardon himself . ...
